name: Nina Amir
offering: Intuition Coaching, Podcast Host, Spiritual Coaching
what_you_do: Certified High Performance Coach, Author Coach, and Blog-to-Book Coach who helps people combine their passion and purpose to move from idea to inspired action.
who_you_serve: Writers, bloggers, authorpreneurs, blogpreneurs, entrepreneurs, creatives, athletes, and anyone who wants to create something new.
social_proof: Nine-time Amazon bestselling author, one of 300 elite Certified High Performance Coaches in the world, award-winning blogger, international speaker, clients who have sold 300,000+ copies of their books and landed deals with major publishing houses.
signature_programs: How to Blog a Book, The Author Training Manual, Creative Visualization for Writers, National Nonfiction Writing Month, National Book Blogging Month, Nonfiction Writers' University, Author of Change Transformational Coaching Program, Read and Write Your Sacred Text framework, Author Training curriculum
business_focus: Helping writers and aspiring authors create, publish, and promote books while achieving high performance in their personal and professional lives.
service_provided: High Performance Coaching, Author Coaching, Book Coaching, Blog-to-Book Coaching, Speaking, Corporate Training, Workshop Leadership
